mapper.select: SELECT E.event_id, E.branch_id, B.branch_id, B.city_id, B.branch_name, B.address, C.city_id, C.city_name, E.event_type_id, ET.event_type_name, E.category_id, CA.category_name, E.title, E.content, E.image_url, E.start_date, E.end_date, E.view_count, E.detail_address FROM EVENT E LEFT JOIN BRANCH B ON E.branch_id = B.branch_id LEFT JOIN CITY C ON B.city_id = C.city_id LEFT JOIN EVENT_TYPE ET ON E.event_type_id = ET.event_type_id LEFT JOIN CATEGORY CA ON E.category_id = CA.category_id WHERE event_id = #{eventId}

SELECT E.event_id, E.branch_id, B.branch_id, B.city_id, B.branch_name, B.address, C.city_id, C.city_name, E.event_type_id, ET.event_type_name, E.category_id, CA.category_name, E.title, E.content, E.image_url, E.start_date, E.end_date, E.view_count, E.detail_address FROM EVENT E LEFT JOIN BRANCH B ON E.branch_id = B.branch_id LEFT JOIN CITY C ON B.city_id = C.city_id LEFT JOIN EVENT_TYPE ET ON E.event_type_id = ET.event_type_id LEFT JOIN CATEGORY CA ON E.category_id = CA.category_id ORDER BY event_id DESC OFFSET (#{page}-1) * #{amount} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{amount} ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EVENT ( event_id, branch_id, event_type_id, category_id, title, content, image_url, start_date, end_date, detail_address ) VALUES ( SEQ_EVENT.NEXTVAL, #{branchId}, #{eventTypeId}, #{categoryId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{imageUrl}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{detailAddress} )
mapper.update: UPDATE EVENT SET branch_id = #{branchId}, event_type_id = #{eventTypeId}, category_id = #{categoryId}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, image_url = #{imageUrl}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, detail_address = #{detailAddress} WHERE event_id = #{eventId}
